scripts.reset: npx locklift run --disable-build --script scripts/reset-migration.ts --config locklift.config.ts --network venom_testnet

scripts.deploy:wvenom: npx locklift run --disable-build --script scripts/wvenom-setup.ts --config locklift.config.ts --network venom_testnet
scripts.deploy:tip3-venom: npx locklift run --disable-build --script scripts/deploy-tip3-to-venom.ts --config locklift.config.ts --network venom_testnet
scripts.deploy:venom-tip3: npx locklift run --diable-build --script scripts/deploy-venom-to-tip3.ts --config locklift.config.ts --network venom_testnet
